content.raw: Thanks. I see the link pose is still different, do you know why it was changed? In fact, I don't know why the ball on gazebo_models has a z offset which isn't even equal to the radius... I think it would make calculations easier if the ball was centred at 0,0,0. You've implemented the calculations, what do you think?
content.html: Thanks. I see the link pose is still different, do you know why it was changed? In fact, I don't know why the ball on gazebo_models has a z offset which isn't even equal to the radius... I think it would make calculations easier if the ball was centred at 0,0,0. You've implemented the calculations, what do you think?
